Description:
Detects the use of Moriya rootkit as described in the securelist's Operation TunnelSnake report

Author: Bhabesh Raj
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Moriya Rootkit - System
Query: sourcetype='windows-system' eql select * from _source_ where provider_name = 'service control manager' and eventid = '7045' and servicename = 'zznetsvc'
